title: AgriPhytosanitary Schema
description: Schema for AgriPhytosanitary entity. Phytosanitary means relating to the health of plants.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type. It has to be AgriPhytosanitary.

subtype.description: Property. Detailed information about the subtype of the phytosanitary product.

idpdf.description: Property. Identifier assigned to the type of phytosanitary product. Used to access official information via a URL (old PDF).

code.description: Property. Code assigned to the type of phytosanitary product.

name.description: Property. Name assigned to the type of phytosanitary product.

names.description: Property. Common names of the type of phytosanitary.

idate.description: Property. Date of registration of the type of phytosanitary.

rdate.description: Property. Renewal date of the type of phytosanitary.

edate.description: Property. Expiration date of the type of phytosanitary.

cdate.description: Property. Cancellation date of the type of phytosanitary.

ldate.description: Property.Sale limit date of the type of phytosanitary product.

mix.description: Property. Indicates whether the phytosanitary product is miscible (value = 1) or not (value = 0).

idtf.description: Property. Identifiers of the function types of the phytosanitary type.

comp.description: Property. Details of the company associated with the subtype.

id.description: Property. Identifier assigned to the active matter.

name.description: Property. Name assigned to the active matter.

prod.description: Property. Information on the types of phytosanitary product.

id.description: Property. Identifier assigned to the type of phytosanitary product.

name.description: Property. Name assigned to the type of phytosanitary product.

ci.description: Property. Information on crops and infections of the phytosanitary type.

measure.description: Property. Unit of measure for the dose.

efficacy.description: Property. Efficacy details of the phytosanitary product.

id.description: Property. Identifier for the efficacy record.

name.description: Property. Name of the efficacy record.

detail.description: Property. Detailed information about the efficacy.

typerisk.description: Property. Type of risk associated with the phytosanitary product.

infection.description: Property. Information about infections that are part of the campaign.

detail.description: Property. Additional details about the phytosanitary product.

tj.description: Property. Information on the types of justification that motivate the administration of non-chemical phytosanitary defense in the campaign.

idtpismv.description: Property. IDs of stock entries linked to the phytosanitary product administered in the campaign.

distributed.description: Property. Indicates whether the consumption of the phytosanitary administered in the campaign has to be distributed equally between the stock entries or not.

dt.description: Property. Date related to the product's distribution or usage.

st.description: Property. Status of the phytosanitary product.

preventive.description: Property. Preventive measures associated with the product.

pp.description: Property. Pre-processing information related to the product.

speed.description: Property. Application speed for the phytosanitary product.

recipe.description: Property. Recipe or formulation details for the product.

surface.description: Property. Surface area for application of the product.

entrylimit.description: Property. Entry limit or threshold for the product's application.

seclimit.description: Property. Secondary limit or threshold for the product's application.

machine.description: Property. Information on the machinery assigned to the application of the fertilizer as well as information on its hygiene.

idcp.description: Property. IDs of the CropSigpac on which the non-chemical phytosanitary defense is administered in the campaign.
